title: Draft FortiGate + Supply Chain Attack Client Advisory
description: Draft a client advisory covering the AI-assisted FortiGate breach (600+ devices) and supply chain attacks (NuGet, Codespaces). Include actionable steps for Capital Cyber clients.

title: Build Common Good Cyber Fund Application Tracker for CGA
description: Map eligibility criteria against CGA capabilities. Create timeline tracker for the $3.5M grant opportunity (June 23 open date).

title: Research Small DIB Companies Struggling with CMMC Level 2
description: Compile prospect list of companies in 50-500 employee range struggling with CMMC readiness. Nov 2026 Phase 2 deadline creating urgency.

title: Draft Outreach for Rhode Island College CMMC Summit
description: Explore speaking slot or sponsorship opportunity. Draft talking points for outreach.

title: Update Sales Messaging: 'Outcomes Not Tools' Positioning
description: Incorporate MSSP Alert 2026 Blueprint insights. Draft 3-5 revised talking points emphasizing results and compliance over tool stacking.

title: Evaluate TIG Grant for CGA Eligibility
description: Assess Federal Technology Initiative Grant program for CGA fit. Draft go/no-go recommendation memo. Pre-app deadline April 10.

title: Draft Cisco CVE-2026-20127 Client Advisory
description: Write a branded advisory email for Capital Cyber clients about the CVSS 10.0 zero day actively exploited since 2023.

title: Build CMMC Contract Tracker
description: Scrape PreVeil's running list of DoD solicitations requiring CMMC. Create a daily-updated tracking doc.

title: Create SLCGP Grant Opportunity Monitor
description: Set up automated daily scanning cron job for new SLCGP and cyber grant postings.

title: Build Prospect Outreach List from Threat Intel
description: Match threat intel to client verticals (healthcare, defense, Cisco shops) for targeted outreach. Needs CRM access.

title: Auto-Update Dashboard Intel Feed
description: Wire daily cron to push updated data/intel.json and data/tasks.json to GitHub automatically.

title: Draft CMMC Readiness Pitch for Small DIB Suppliers
description: One-pager pitch doc targeting small defense contractors struggling with compliance.

title: Draft Cold Email Sequence for 210 DCAA Contractors
description: Write 3-email outreach sequence from CGA positioning the CMMC Gap Assessment as a grant opportunity. Targets: 210 manufacturing and construction contractors (VA 72, FL 32, MD 32, NY 18, PA 17, AZ 12, NJ 11, others 16). Awaiting contractor CSV from Nikhil.

title: Update Summit Page: Session Title & Giveaway
description: Update Nikhil session from "CMMC Ready Now: A Platform Demo" to "Live Gap Assessment Demo." Change giveaway from 20 CMMC Ready Now accounts to 20 Free CMMC Gap Assessment Grants. Consider speaker swap (Sam Durso → NIST MEP / SBA / GENEDGE rep).

title: Draft Press Release: CGA CMMC Gap Assessment Program Launch
description: Draft and distribute press release: "Cyber Grants Alliance Launches Free CMMC Gap Assessment Program for DoD Contractors." Target defense industry publications, Virginia business press, manufacturing trade outlets.

title: Build GHL Grant Code Issuance Workflow
description: Set up automated workflow in GoHighLevel: grant application submitted → Nikhil/Rick review → approval triggers grant code email to applicant with link to assessment.cmmcreadynow.com.

title: Upload CMMC Gap Assessment Grant Page to CGA Website
description: Add the CMMC Gap Assessment Grant page to cybergrantsalliance.org (WordPress/Elementor). HTML already built. Covers: what the grant includes, who qualifies, how to apply, included vs not included, FAQ.

title: Summit Promotion: Gap Assessment as Registration Hook
description: Draft promotional copy: "Register for the Cyber Grant Summit and receive a free CMMC Gap Assessment grant code." Use across email, LinkedIn, and CGA channels.

title: Assessment Portal Branding Polish
description: Align assessment.cmmcreadynow.com design with main cmmcreadynow.com site (logo, fonts, colors, footer). In progress per Ares.
